positions.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: Improved system performance by optimizing the media processing pipeline, including avatar rendering, video polling stability, and slides voice synchronization, resulting in faster response times and smoother playback.
Developed core features for an AI avatar presentation platform by integrating RAG-based document processing, semantic search, Microsoft avatars, and real-time AI-driven Q&A functionality.

Built a scalable subscription and billing system by implementing payment integration, credit management, automated renewals, and cron-based workflows, improving billing reliability and reducing manual intervention.
Designed and implemented dashboard and project analytics features that allow users to manage projects, track usage, and view analytics based on their requirements.
